title: Resize the new Client
body: Hello! Is there any way to resize the client?  It's so big that I can't actually see the 'play' button on the bottom because of my mac bar.  I have to open so many applications right now just so that I can click on it.  Please help!

replies.body: I know on Windows, Ctrl+Down Arrow can help reduce the updated client's size.  I'm not sure if this works on Mac, but let me know.
It doesn't change the size (it does the same thing as if you were to swipe four fingers down).
